description.narrative: By 2025, capacity of the Ethiopian General Education System strengthened in evidence-based, equity-focused and decentralized sector planning, policy implementation and monitoring results for children's education., which contributes to Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equitable Access To Quality Education (Covid), Learning Outcomes, Skills Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 'By 2025, girls and boys in Ethiopia, in particular the most disadvantaged and those affected by humanitarian situations, benefit from an equitable and resilient education system enabling them to acquire relevant knowledge and skills.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2025, capacity of the Ethiopian General Education System strengthened in evidence-based, equity-focused and decentralized sector planning, policy implementation and monitoring results for children’s education.
